changeOwner(address).details: Can only be actioned by the current owner. Requires that _newOwner is not address zero

constructor.details: During Deploy the Ethereum address used to deploy the Smart Contract is set as the "owner" and certain functions below can only be actioned by the owner

params._duration: Duration of fund-raising part of Contract, in blocks
params._goal: Financial goal of the Smart Contract, in wei
params._initialPaymentDuration: Period after _duration for owner to start releasing payments, in blocks
params._minimumContribution: Minimum amount required for each contribution, in wei

contribute().details: Payable function that should be sent Ether. Requires that minimum contribution value is met and deadline is not passed

createRequest(string,uint256,address).details: Can only be actioned by the owner. Requires that the goal has been reached and the _value is not zero and does not exceed amountRaised or balance available on the contract. Also requires that _recipient is not address zero and requestCountMax has not been reached. Each spending request is stored sequentially starting from record 0

params._description: A description of what the money will be spent on
params._recipient: The Ethereum address of where the money will be sent
params._value: The amount being spent with this spending request

getRefund().details: Requires that the contribution exists, the deadline has passed and NO payments have been made. If the goal is reached then requires that initialPaymentDeadline has passed

params._index: Index Number of Spending Request to check

releasePayment(uint256).details: Can only be actioned by the owner. Requires that the request exists and is not completed, and that there are funds available to make the payment. Also requires that over 50% of the contributors voted for the request

params._index: Index Number of Spending Request to release payment

voteForRequest(uint256).details: Requires that the caller made a contribution and has not already voted for the request. Also requires that the request exists and is not completed

params._index: Index Number of Spending Request to vote for

changeOwner(address).notice: Change the owner of the contract

methods.constructor: Constructor Function used to deploy contract

getRefund().notice: Process a Refund, including reversing any voting

hasVoted(uint256,address).notice: View if account has voted for spending request

releasePayment(uint256).notice: Release the payment for a spending request

userdoc.notice: A smart contract based fundraising. Uses community voting for allowence of spending
